title: Guest House Evika Hrabu≈°ice
subtitle: Your perfect stay in the Slovak Paradise
description: Ubytovanie Tri Sestry Hrabusice hotel, located just 12 minutes on foot from Catholic Church, features Wi-Fi throughout the property. This guest house entices guests with parking, available on site. Hrabusice centre can be reached within 5 minutes' walk. The hotel in Hrabusice is relatively close to Monastery Gorge. Located 10 minutes by car from the national Prielom Hornadu Nature Reserve, this accommodation puts the city at your fingertips. For those travelling from afar, Poprad-Tatry airport is 27 minutes' drive away.

policy_paragraph_1:
Check-in: from 10:30 until 20:00
Check-out: from 07:00 until 09:00
Children and extra beds
There are no cots provided in a room.
policy_paragraph_2:
Please inform in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
